龜.definition: used in 龜茲|龟兹[Qiu1 ci2]

龜尾市.definition: Gumi city in North Gyeongsang Province, South Korea

龜毛.definition: (Tw) (coll.) indecisive; fussy; nitpicking (from Taiwanese, Tai-lo pr. [ku-moo])

龜甲萬.definition: Kikkoman, Japanese brand of soy sauce, food seasonings etc

龜笑鱉無尾.definition: lit. a tortoise laughing at a soft-shelled turtle for having no tail (idiom); fig. the pot calling the kettle black

龜船.definition: "turtle ship", armored warship used by Koreans in fighting the Japanese during the Imjin war of 1592-1598 壬辰倭亂|壬辰倭乱[ren2 chen2 wo1 luan4]

龜苓膏.definition: turtle jelly, medicine made with powdered turtle shell and herbs; a similar product made without turtle shell and consumed as a dessert

龜茲.definition: ancient Central Asian city state, flourished in first millennium AD, in modern Aksu 阿克蘇地區|阿克苏地区, Xinjiang

龜裂.definition: to crack; cracked; fissured; creviced; (of skin) chapped

龜頭.definition: head of a turtle; glans penis
